title: 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner, 10ft Rustic Sheer Runner Gauze Tablecloth Boho Wedding Decor Romantic Table Runner for Wedding Bridal Shower Birthday Party(35" x 118") (Terracotta)
descriptions:
Product Name: 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner, 10ft Rustic Sheer Runner Gauze Tablecloth Boho Wedding Decor Romantic Table Runner for Wedding Bridal Shower Birthday Party (Terracotta)

Product Details:

Material: High-quality polyester
Package Contents: 12 pieces of cheesecloth table runners
Dimensions: Width - 35 inches, Length - 118 inches

Features:
- Premium Material: Made from high-quality polyester, these table runners are soft to touch, comfortable, and highly durable. Not easily worn or torn, they are also lightweight and skin-friendly.
- Size: With a width of 35 inches and a length of 118 inches, these table runners are designed to fit most tables.
- Multi-Purpose Use: Ideal for a variety of occasions and settings, these table runners can be used for wedding parties, holiday parties, birthday parties, in restaurants, hotels, as chair cover sashes, decorative napkins, and even for gift wrapping.
- Reusability: These table runners are reusable. They can be hand washed or machine washed on a gentle cycle using cold water and mild detergent. Please avoid ironing.

Care Instructions:
- Hand Wash: True
- Machine Wash: Gentle cycle
- Iron: False
- Hot Water: False
- Detergent: Mild
- Water Temperature: Cold

Customer Support: Free to contact for any questions.

Bring a rustic and romantic touch to your events with these 12 pack cheesecloth table runners. The high-quality polyester material ensures durability and comfort, while the soft texture adds a luxurious feel. These table runners are versatile and can be used for various occasions and settings. With easy care instructions, you can reuse them multiple times.
